attributes.action: Referendum now on E.U. Membership before Bulgarians and Romanians Arrive
attributes.additional_details:
We want the government to hold a referendum now on E.U.Membership before the changes to immigration continue to over run this country with more Eastern Europeans from Bulgaria and Romania.
We are a tiny overpopulated island and we cannot continue to open our borders to yet more.
The Hospitals, Schools, Houseing are overstretched and not to mention the lack of employment for our own.
David Cameron WAKE UP, we can all see it, why can't you.
